## Summary
::: {.incremental}
- The BrainGlobe Initiative provides open source tools for computational neuroanatomy
    - BrainGlobe atlases facilitate interoperability
    - Modular tools promote reuse
- Community building is key to expanding access
    - Ensure tools are maintained and updated to build trust
    - Provide extensive documentation and tutorials
    - Be available to support users and contributors
:::
